summary: User requests batched replay functionality to replay multiple workflows in parallel, which would improve test performance by allowing concurrent worker initialization instead of sequential replays.
userImpact: Users must replay workflows sequentially, causing slow test execution when validating determinism across multiple workflows.
rootCause: Worker registration and initialization is not parallelizable in current implementation; each replay requires sequential setup.
proposedFix: Add a batched replay feature that accepts a list of workflow IDs and replays them in parallel, returning results and failures.
workaround: Use Promise.allSettled to parallelize runReplayHistory calls manually, though this provides limited speedup due to serialized worker initialization.
resolutionDetails: Support added in sdk-core which enables batched replay functionality.
keyQuote: It would be useful to have a feature that allows you to kick off a replay that takes in a list of workflow IDs and replays all of them in parallel
